metadata.title: CVE-2024-42157 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/pkey: Wipe sensitive data on failureWipe sensitive data from stack also if the copy_to_user() fails.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-42157` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-48-generic - 6.8.0-48.48
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-48-generic - 6.8.0-48.48
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-48-generic-64k - 6.8.0-48.48
No subscription required
